ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] problems
ygData.msgSnippet: I had a problem of not being able to load a DLL file and I had to go to EQs website and download the patch from there or something.. Have you tried
ygData.messageBody:
I had a problem of not being able to load a DLL file and I had to go to EQs
website and download the patch from there or something..
Have you tried reinstalling the game?
luv,
-Su

Does anyone know how to fix the following problem? I can log onto the
sever screen and chose my server but when I click play everquest i get a
eggame caused an error in DINPUT8.DLL I have tryed to fix it by restarting
the system like they day to but get no results. I have a GeForce3 TI 200
video card. I was wondering if anyone else has had this problem.
